dependencies: go.opentelemetry.io/otel v1.25.0 and related exporters/sdk/trace/metric packages (go.mod, utils/otel.go)
Indirect notable deps: github.com/getkin/kin-openapi (OpenAPI tooling), github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v5 (auth token lib), google.golang.org/grpc + grpc-gateway (go.mod)
architectural_resources: Go HTTP API service (built as a single binary; entrypoint main.go)
Container image build pipeline (multi-stage Docker build in ci/Dockerfile)
Istio resources: VirtualServices (2) and an external Istio Gateway reference (istio-ingress/ingress-gateway) (ci/deployment.yaml)
Distributed tracing backend dependency: Grafana Tempo via OTLP/HTTP endpoint tempo-distributor.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:4318 (main.go flags, ci/deployment.yaml, utils/otel.go)
Observability/metrics: OpenTelemetry metrics exporter (stdoutmetric) and trace exporter (OTLP) (utils/otel.go)
Inter-service HTTP call dependency: service2 proxies to service1 via --proxy-endpoint http://my-go-app-service:8080/svc1 (main.go, ci/deployment.yaml)
